rows.label: tlk70000025_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey everyone! I just gotta thank you -
'specially you, Adel-sama.

rows.label: tlk70000025_04_msg0002
rows.name:
For volunteers like me and for peeps
who've lost their homes in the war,
this place is kinda like our haven.

rows.label: tlk70000025_04_msg0003
rows.name:
If I'd ended up in the Iiran army,
I might never have noticed all the
refugees who needed help here...

rows.label: tlk70000025_04_msg0004
rows.name:
So I gotta thank you for getting me
started with the resistance. I'm real
grateful, seriously.
